panel.title: Enable Markdown in your Apps
panel.html:
Just add the following code to your SimpleXML dashboards: or for forms:
and add a panel to visualize your markdown file:

dashboard_assistant

README.md

 Both headings will be replaced by the markdown content. If no appname and filepath are provided as headings the SA-markdown will try to use readme.md in the current app folder.
